Privacy Policy

Your privacy is our priority. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

Last updated: October 28, 2025

1. Introduction

Welcome to **Trace'N Find** ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy. This **Privacy Policy** explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website and mobile application (the "Service").

By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

2. Information We Collect

We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.

A. Personal Information

While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information (**PII**) that can be used to contact or identify you. This includes:

  • **Email Address:** Used for account creation, login, and important notifications.
  • **Username:** Used to identify you on our public-facing service components.
  • **Phone Number (Optional):** Used for **Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)** and account recovery.

B. Device & Location Information

This is the core data required for our Service to function:

  • **Real-Time Location:** We collect precise geolocation data (GPS, Wi-Fi, cellular) from your registered devices to display their location on your dashboard.
  • **Location History:** We store a history of your device's locations to provide you with a breadcrumb trail.
  • **Device Information:** We collect device-specific information such as device model, operating system, unique device identifiers (e.g., IMEI, Serial Number), and network information (IP address, MAC address).
  • **Device Status:** We monitor and store your device's status, including battery level, network signal strength, and connectivity (online/offline).

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected data for various purposes:

  • To provide and maintain the Service (i.e., to track your devices).
  • To notify you about activity, such as **geofencing alerts** or low battery warnings.
  • To allow you to execute **remote security commands** (lock, wipe, ring).
  • To secure your account via Multi-Factor Authentication.
  • To provide customer support.
  • To monitor the usage of the Service and improve its performance and **scalability**.

4. Data Security

The security of your data is a core feature of our project. We implement robust security measures to protect your information.

  • **Data Encryption:** All data transmitted to and from our servers is encrypted using **Transport Layer Security (TLS)**.
  • **Firestore Security Rules:** We leverage Firebase's security rules to ensure your data is strictly segregated. Your private data (location, phone number, device details) is stored in a document path (/user_data/{userId}) that is **only accessible by you**. No other user can read or write to your private data.
  • **Secure-by-Design:** Publicly visible information (like your username) is stored in a separate collection (/users/{userId}) to prevent accidental exposure of sensitive PII.

5. Data Retention

We will retain your **Personal Information** and **Location History** only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.

You may **delete your account and all associated data** at any time through your account settings page.

6. Your Data Protection Rights

You have certain data protection rights. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Information.

  • **The right to access:** You can access your data at any time via your dashboard.
  • **The right to rectification:** You can correct any inaccurate information from your profile settings.
  • **The right to erasure:** You have the right to request that we delete your data.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the **"Last updated"** date at the top.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • By email: privacy@trace-n-find.com
  • By visiting our Contact Page.
